sentences.sContent: The Inca had no system of hieroglyphic writing, as the Maya did, and any portraits that Inca artists may have made of their rulers were lost.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Inca had no system of hieroglyphic writing, as the Maya did, and any portraits that Inca artists may have made of their rulers were lost.
sentences.sCn: 和玛雅人一样，印加人也没有象形文字书写系统，而且印加艺术家们所绘制的统治者肖像业已失传。

synos.tran: [语]象形文字；象形文字写的文章

words.tran: 象形文字的；难解的（等于hieroglyphic）
象形文字；图画文字；秘密符号

trans.tranCn: 象形文字；象形文字写的文章
trans.tranOther: a picture or symbol representing an object, concept, or sound
of or relating to a form of writing using picture symbols, esp as used in ancient Egypt
